pkgmetadata.longdescription: Linear mixed effect model splines for modelling and analysis of time course data // The package implements linear mixed effect model splines for modelling and differential expression for highly dimensional data sets: investNoise for quality control and filterNoise for removing non-informative trajectories; lmmSpline to model time course expression profiles and lmmsDE performs differential expression analysis to identify differential expression between groups, time and/or time x group interaction.
